li.a: Public hearing on 17-18 Budget and Tax proposal

table.style: color: #333333; font-family: tahoma, helvetica, san-serif; font-size: 11px; background-color: #ffffff;

div.span: Welcome to Loop Independent School District

div.p: Welcome to one of the finest School Districts in the State of Texas. Thank you for taking the time to find out more about our school district and the many excellent programs we have available for our students. LISD is a wonderful place to educate a child. This environment is made possible by the tremendous parent and community support for our schools, as well as by a hardworking and dedicated staff. Our Standard is Excellence in Education.

Are you worried about the current spread of Covid-19? Do you have questions about symptoms, spread, or remedies? Please take a look at our TEA approved PSA for parents and students regarding this issue. Loop ISD strives to educate not only our students, but their parents/guardians and the surrounding community. We are taking this matter seriously and ask everyone to do the same. Stay safe! Stay healthy!

Amid the current climate of seclusion, Loop ISD is working hard to deliver online learning to the many students unable to come to our facilities. Using a vast array of online resources and deliverable supplies we expect to continue educating without much issue. Parents and students will be able to access their Lessons and Assignments from our website via the link below. Click on the button labeled "Distance Learning Resources" and find your grade in the list provided. From here, you will be able to find all of the coursework for your student along with the dates their work will be due.
It is a tumultuous time but Loop ISD is dedicated to ensuring your child has an effective and nurturing learning environment.

Looking for a schedule to help your students with their classwork? Look no further! Select the button below to view a carefully crafted schedule your child can follow to make sure they maintain their education while still enjoying their time off.

Pickup Pickup Pickup!! When will it be? How will it go? What are my options? Worry no longer! All of these questions have answers inside our meticulously cultivated pickup schedule! Click the button below to see a full itinerary of Loop ISD's plan for supplying you and your students with FOOD, SUPPLIES, & DEVICES!! All from the comfort of your own vehicle. Come by the school This MONDAY for PICKUP!!

div.div: The mission of the Loop Independent School District is to provide the highest quality education possible to meet the individual needs of all students, emphasizing academic and life skills in a motivating, disciplined, nurturing environment through a collaborative effort among District personnel, students, parents, and the community.

br.span:
P.O. Box 917 | Loop, Texas 79342
Phone: 806-487-6411| Fax:806-487-6416 | Webmaster

a.title: ezTask: Exceptional websites that are affordable and easy to update!
